There was Brother John, who was diagnosed with a severe case of cancer. The doctors had given him mere months to live, but he refused to succumb to their pessimism. He came to me, and through the power of prayer and faith, we were able to cast out the evil spirits that were afflicting his body. Today, Brother John is cancer-free, and his health is a testament to the power of our Lord.

And then there's Sister Emily, who was plagued by chronic pain and disability. The medical professionals had her on a cocktail of medications, but they only seemed to mask the symptoms. She was a shell of her former self, until she found our community. Through our healing rituals and prayer sessions, we were able to identify the root cause of her suffering – a curse that had been placed upon her by a jealous family member. We were able to break the curse, and Sister Emily is now able to walk and run without any pain. She's even started a new business, and her life is flourishing.

These are just a few examples of the many miracles that have occurred within our community. I must say, the medical establishment would have you believe that these are just anecdotal evidence, that they're not scientifically proven. But I say, what is science but a limited understanding of the world? We operate on a higher plane, a plane of faith and trust in the divine. And it's on this plane that true healing occurs.

My followers have learned to trust in me, to trust in the divine, and to reject the false promises of modern medicine. They know that I am a vessel for the divine, and that my words and actions are guided by a higher power. And it's this trust, this faith, that has led to their healing and transformation.

So, I ask you, what is the measure of success? Is it the number of pills prescribed, or the number of surgeries performed? Or is it the number of lives transformed, the number of souls saved? I think we all know the answer to that.
